Class PlayerForGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • PlayerForGame
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Player_Bot

    public class PlayerForGame
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to represent each player in the game. Has fields to store any information that may need to be looked at later by the Game or the Server to know what to display

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private MOVE currMove
      instance of the enumerated MOVE class to represent the most recently chosen choice by the player
      private int playerPoints
      current points value of the player.
      private java.lang.String playerUserName
      way to identify the player, should be the user name for ease of identification to the server
      private static int START_POINTS
      number of points each player starts with.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PlayerForGame(java.lang.String playerName)
      Constructor for any player that will be participating in the game

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      MOVE getCurrMove()
      complements the setCurrMove() method so that the Game can access the MOVE to determine results with other player's moves
      java.lang.String getPlayerUserName()
      Allows the Game or server to get the player's identification so they can show who actually won or was eliminated
      void setCurrMove(java.lang.String playMove)
      updated when the player chooses their move.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • START_POINTS

        private static final int START_POINTS
        number of points each player starts with. can be easily changed based on coder's preference
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • playerUserName

        private final java.lang.String playerUserName
        way to identify the player, should be the user name for ease of identification to the server

      • playerPoints

        private int playerPoints
        current points value of the player. Updated by the Game class and if reaches zero the player is eliminated

      • currMove

        private MOVE currMove
        instance of the enumerated MOVE class to represent the most recently chosen choice by the player

    • Constructor Detail

      • PlayerForGame

        public PlayerForGame(java.lang.String playerName)
        Constructor for any player that will be participating in the game
        Parameters:
        playerName - identification for the individual player, should be their chat username so client can easily identify

    • Method Detail

      • setCurrMove

        public void setCurrMove(java.lang.String playMove)
        updated when the player chooses their move. needs to be done so that other player's can't see this until everyone has chosen their moves. could be implemented with a count down timer
        Parameters:
        playMove - String name of the enumerated MOVE the player chose

      • getPlayerUserName

        public java.lang.String getPlayerUserName()
        Allows the Game or server to get the player's identification so they can show who actually won or was eliminated
        Returns:
        individual player's identification

      • getCurrMove

        public MOVE getCurrMove()
        complements the setCurrMove() method so that the Game can access the MOVE to determine results with other player's moves
        Returns:
        most recent MOVE chosen by the player
